/hivefiver research

Mode: floppy_engineer
Governance: strict
Skills to apply: hivefiver-persona-routing, hivefiver-bilingual-tutor, hivefiver-mcp-research-loop, hivefiver-skill-auditor, hivefiver-domain-pack-router

Constraints: no same-role self-delegation.
Return format:
1) RESEARCH EVIDENCE MATRIX
2) ALIGNMENT STATUS (roadmap vs code)
3) BLOCKER STATUS
4) NEXT ACTION
